description.value:
Trigger You attempt a skill check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Recall Knowledge] about a piece of technology or to use a technological device, or you roll a saving throw against an effect with the technology trait.

Focusing on a piece of technology, you get a brief glimpse of its nature and function. You roll the triggering check twice (or the GM rolls in the case of checks to Recall Knowledge) and use the better result.

@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Tech Intuition]
